update t_goods
GOODS_ID = #{record.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CAT_ID = #{record.catId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BRAND_ID = #{record.brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROMPT_ID = #{record.promptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMPANY_ID = #{record.companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STORE_ID = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKETABLE = #{record.marketable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE = #{record.score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COST = #{record.cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MKT_PRICE = #{record.mktPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE = #{record.store,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE_FREEZE = #{record.storeFreeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update t_goods set P_2=1 where GOODS_ID in

mapper.select:
select
from t_goods where DISABLED="0" and MARKETABLE_ALLOW='0' and P_1 is not NULL and store < P_1 GROUP BY COMPANY_ID , STORE_ID
select g.* from t_goods g, t_products p where g.goods_id=p.goods_id and p.product_id=#{productId}

SELECT A.GOODS_ID, A.CAT_ID, D.CAT_NAME, D.CAT_LOGO, A. NAME, F.STORE_NAME, A.WEIGHT, A.SCORE, A.LAST_MODIFY, A.UP_TIME, A.DOWN_TIME, A.STORE, A.MKT_PRICE, A.FBN, A.DBN, A.BRIEF, A.COST, B.BRAND_NAME, B.BRAND_LOGO, A.PRICE, A.FAV_COUNT, A.RANK_COUNT, A.COMMENTS_COUNT, A.VIEW_COUNT, A.VIEW_W_COUNT, A.VIEW_M_COUNT, A.BUY_COUNT, A.BUY_W_COUNT, A.BUY_M_COUNT, A.UNIT, A.MARKETABLE,A.THUMBNAIL_PIC,A.SMALL_PIC,A.MID_PIC,A.BIG_PIC
FROM T_GOODS A, T_BRAND B, T_GOODS_CAT D, T_COMPANY F
WHERE B.BRAND_ID = A.BRAND_ID AND D.CAT_ID = A.CAT_ID AND F.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_ID AND A.MARKETABLE = #{marketableQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DISABLED = #{disabledQ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY A.LAST_MODIFY desc

select
from t_goods where GOODS_ID in(${goodsIds})

SELECT A.GOODS_ID, A.CAT_ID, D.CAT_NAME, D.CAT_LOGO, A.NAME, F.STORE_NAME, A.WEIGHT, A.SCORE,A.COMPANY_ID, A.LAST_MODIFY, A.UP_TIME, A.DOWN_TIME, A.STORE, A.MKT_PRICE, A.FBN, A.DBN, A.BRIEF, A.COST,A.PRICE, A.FAV_COUNT, A.RANK_COUNT, A.COMMENTS_COUNT, A.VIEW_COUNT, A.VIEW_W_COUNT, A.VIEW_M_COUNT, A.BUY_COUNT, A.BUY_W_COUNT, A.BUY_M_COUNT, A.UNIT, A.MARKETABLE, A.THUMBNAIL_PIC, A.SMALL_PIC, A.MID_PIC, A.BIG_PIC,A.P_22 FROM T_GOODS A JOIN T_GOODS_CAT D ON D.CAT_ID = A.CAT_ID JOIN T_COMPANY F ON F.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_ID where A.DISABLED="0" and A.MARKETABLE = '1' and A.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and A.STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and A.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and A.store>= #{storeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update t_goods set COMMENTS_COUNT=COMMENTS_COUNT+1 where GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT g.GOODS_ID, g.`NAME`, g.PRICE, g.SMALL_PIC, g.BUY_COUNT FROM t_goods g LEFT JOIN t_company c on g.company_id = c.company_id WHERE g.BUY_COUNT>0 AND (g.disabled !=1 or g.disabled is null) AND g.company_id = ${companyId} AND (c.limit_store !=1 or c.limit_store is null) AND (c.limit_storedown !=1 or c.limit_storedown is null) AND (c.shopstatus !=1 or c.shopstatus is null) AND (c.status !=1 or c.status is null) AND (c.disabled !=1 or c.disabled is null) order by buy_count desc LIMIT 10

select
,
from t_goods where BRAND_ID=#{brandId} and disabled='0' and MARKETABLE='1'

SELECT goods.GOODS_ID, goods.MID_PIC, goods.NAME, goods.PRICE, accessory.ACC_NAME, p_value.VALUE, p_value.CATALOG_ID, p_value.PARAM_ID FROM t_goods goods LEFT JOIN t_accessory accessory ON goods.ACC_ID=accessory.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN v_accessor_param_value p_value ON accessory.ACC_ID = p_value.ACC_ID where goods.goods_id in
#{item}

select g.* from t_goods g, t_products p where g.goods_id = p.goods_id and p.product_id in
#{item}
mapper.update: update t_goods set BUY_COUNT = BUY_COUNT+#{buyCount} where GOODS_ID=#{goodsId}
mapper.select: select IF(a.goods_num>a.sumCount,1,0) as num from (SELECT tcs.goods_num ,t_goods.GOODS_ID,count(t.company_id) as sumCount FROM t_company t JOIN t_company_storegrade tcs ON t.grade_id=tcs.grade_id LEFT JOIN t_goods ON (t_goods.COMPANY_ID=t.company_id and t_goods.DISABLED='0') WHERE t.company_id = #{companyId}) as a
select limit_goods from t_business_storemanger where store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.update: update t_goods set store = (select sum(p.store) from t_products p where p.goods_id=(select goods_id from t_products where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER})) where t_goods.goods_id = (select goods_id from t_products where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update t_goods set MARKETABLE='0' where COMPANY_ID in
#{item}
mapper.select: select g.*,b.brand_name from t_goods g left join t_brand b on g.brand_id = b.brand_id where g.goods_id = #{goodsId}
select g.*,b.brand_name from t_goods g left join t_products p on g.goods_id = p.goods_id left join t_brand b on g.brand_id = b.brand_id where p.product_id =#{productId}

select min(store) from t_goods where goods_id in
#{item}

SELECT goods.GOODS_ID goodsId, goods.CAR_ID carId, goods.MID_PIC midPic, goods.PRICE price, goods.MKT_PRICE mktPrice, car.car_name carName, car.car_dept_id carDeptId, cy.car_year_value carYear, cy.id carYearId, dept.car_dept_name carDeptName, factory.factory_id factoryId, factory.factory_name factoryName, brand.brand_id brandId, brand.brand_name brandName, config.Configs FROM t_goods goods INNER JOIN t_car_config config ON config.car_id=goods.CAR_ID INNER JOIN t_car car ON goods.CAR_ID = car.car_id INNER JOIN t_car_year cy ON cy.id=car.filter_id INNER JOIN t_car_dept dept ON dept.car_dept_id = car.car_dept_id INNER JOIN t_car_factory factory ON factory.factory_id = dept.FactoryID INNER JOIN t_brand brand ON brand.brand_id=factory.brand_id WHERE goods.GOODS_ID IN
#{item}
select getGoodCatChildList(#{pid})
